server.objects.interfaces

Interface MessageInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Message

    public interface MessageInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote
    The message used in the discussion, identified by his user and the message that he sent
    Author:
    Grumpy Group
